title: K-12 Digital e-Learning Adoption Improvement Strategies in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical education knowledge and experience utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Building blended learning environments using e-learning platforms (Blackboard, Zoom, etc.) for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze factors determining e-learning acceptance (instructor quality, perceived usefulness, support conditions)
Learners can design e-learning strategies suitable for medical education contexts (interactivity, motivation, technical support)
Learners can apply e-learning barriers and activation strategies to real-world cases through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
